Description:
Detects the use of the 'Pubprn.vbs' Microsoft signed script to execute commands.

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Pubprn.vbs Proxy Execution
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (command like '%\pubprn.vbs%' and command like '%script:%')
